yepper - I've been running ubuntu since 7.10 (Feisty Fawn) on all my network, never had a driver issue or any problems at all (except when Unity was dumped on us - then I switched to MATE) but since they got rid of that, even with gnome3 only my own computer (this one that I am using) is MATE - all the rest are bone stock Ubuntu, no user issues at all, no network problems, clean, efficient - I am happy :)
